name: places/ChIJ0xH6pCP2wokR_nEUHKoZnXo
formattedAddress: 922 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 922 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025-3742, USA

originalText.text: We had bare concrete in our small 150sq kitchen and needed floor leveled and vinyl click flooring installed. These guys came with a large beautiful branded work truck relieving my worries. They even showed me the material they had in the truck needed to build up the floor. Unfortunately they were not what they led on to be and although when taking the job they assured us it was not a problem they failed miserably to complete it. Twice they mixed the material they brought incorrectly. The first time they removed it and tried again but the second time they decided it would be easier to cut and run. I was told to call a specialist for concrete and that they would return with tools to remove the damage done but then they didn't call me back and stopped picking up my calls. Also, they were constantly late, unprepared, and did everything regarding this job through the behind. If it wasn't for my objection they would have even installed the floor over the crumbling patch work. I am sorry to say this was a terrible experience and unless you need something real simple like carpet glued to the floor a word of CAUTION.
